def is_dvd_player_turned_on(dvd_player:item):
    # Function to check if the DVD player is turned on
    symbol dvd_player_on=is_on(dvd_player)
    return dvd_player_on

def is_remote_control_for_dvd(remote_control:item):
    # Function to determine if the remote control is for the DVD player
    symbol correct_remote=is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control]==2052
    return correct_remote

behavior turn_on_dvd_with_remote(dvd_player:item, remote_control:item):
    body:
        assert has_switch(dvd_player) # Verify if the DVD player has a switch
        assert is_dvd_player(dvd_player) # Verify that the item is a DVD player
        assert is_on(remote_control) # Ensure the remote control is on before using it
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)
